Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S21]: Column already exists: 1060 Duplicate column name 'UserPhoneMobile'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT COUNT(1) AS Count FROM (SELECT			R.*, 
				CONCAT(R.RentVehicleRequestComment, '') AS RentVehicleRequestLookupCaption,
				V.VehicleLicenseNumber,
				V.VehicleBrandName,
				V.VehicleIsActive,
				RouteName,
				RoutePrice,
				US.UserSignInName,
				USD.UserPhoneMobile,
				US.UserPhoneMobile,
				USD.UserNameLast,
				UserGroupID,

				          
				'' AS _Other

FROM			vrs_rentvehiclerequest AS R
    LEFT JOIN vrs_vehicle As V ON V.VehicleID =R.VehicleID 
	LEFT JOIN vrs_route As RU ON RU.RouteID =R.RouteID 
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user As US ON US.UserID  = R.UserID 
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user As USD ON USD.UserID  = R.UserIDDriver
	LEFT JOIN sphp_userusergroup  As UG ON UG.UserID= R.UserIDDriver

-- 	LEFT JOIN sphp_currency As C  ON C.CurrencyID=R.CurrencyID

WHERE R.UserIDDriver=18) AS ___Recordset

args:
SELECT COUNT(1) AS Count FROM (SELECT			R.*, 
				CONCAT(R.RentVehicleRequestComment, '') AS RentVehicleRequestLookupCaption,
				V.VehicleLicenseNumber,
				V.VehicleBrandName,
				V.VehicleIsActive,
				RouteName,
				RoutePrice,
				US.UserSignInName,
				USD.UserPhoneMobile,
				US.UserPhoneMobile,
				USD.UserNameLast,
				UserGroupID,

				          
				'' AS _Other

FROM			vrs_rentvehiclerequest AS R
    LEFT JOIN vrs_vehicle As V ON V.VehicleID =R.VehicleID 
	LEFT JOIN vrs_route As RU ON RU.RouteID =R.RouteID 
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user As US ON US.UserID  = R.UserID 
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user As USD ON USD.UserID  = R.UserIDDriver
	LEFT JOIN sphp_userusergroup  As UG ON UG.UserID= R.UserIDDriver

-- 				'' AS _Other

-- FROM			vrs_rentvehiclerequest AS R
-- 	LEFT JOIN sphp_gender As G  ON G.GenderID=R.GenderID 
-- 	LEFT JOIN sphp_currency As C  ON C.CurrencyID=R.CurrencyID
